text: The Informers is a 2008 American crime drama thriller movie. It is set in Los Angeles in 1983. Kim Basinger plays Laura. Winona Ryder plays Cheryl. Mickey Rourke plays Peter. Amber Heard plays Christie. This movie was released in April 2009 in the United States. The reviews were substandard and poor. title: The Informers (movie)
